question: 5 Books and 7 pens together cost Rs. 79 whereas 7 books and 5 pens together cost Rs. 77, find the total cost of 1 book and 2 pens.
7 audio casettes and 3 video casettes cost Rs. 1110, while 5 audio casettes and 4 video casettes cost Rs. 1350. Find the cost of an audio casette and a video casette.
3 bags and 4 pens together cost Rs. 257 whereas 4 bags and 3 pens together cost Rs. 324. FInd the total cost of 1 bag and 10 pens.
3 tables and 5 chairs together cost RS. 3555, while 7 tables and 4 chairs together cost Rs. 5788. Find the cost of a table and that of the chair.
The sum of two numbers is 128 and their difference is 16. Find the numbers.
Two numbers differ by 3 and their product is 52. Find the numbers.
The age of father is 3 years more than 3 times the son's age. 3 years hence, the age of the father will be 10 years more than twice the age of the son. Find the present age of son?
The sum of a two digit number and the number obtained by reversing the order of its digits is 165. If the digits differ by 3. Find the number.
A two digit number is four times the sum of its digits and twice the product of the digits. Find the number.
The sum of the numerator and denominator of a fraction is 4 more than twice the numerator. If the numerator and denomenator are increased by 3, they are in ratio 2:3. determine the fractions.
